articles.title: Lok Sabha Speaker recognises Rahul Shewale as Shiv Sena floor leader
articles.description: The move comes almost a month after a revolt in the Shiv Sena ranks saw over two-third MLAs joining rebel leader and now Maharashtra Chief Minister Eknath Shinde, paving the way for a new alliance government with the BJP.

articles.title: Kallakurichi violence: Madras high court permits re-postmortem of deceased girl without parents’ consent
articles.description: CHENNAI: The Madras high court on Tuesday permitted authorities to proceed with the re-postmortem on the body of a Class XII girl, who was found dead .
